replies.body: To be fair Yasuo doesn't have any escapes and is very weak to early ganks since he's item reliant.
His escape is a double kill
In Soviet Rift, Yasuo ganks you.

Read KNALXZ comment.  Was about to type about double kill. Saw you beat me to it.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Death is the best CC

> [{quoted}](name=Tails9016,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=jEMuRTlH,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-11-28T19:31:22.280+0000)
>
> His escape is a double kill

memes aside im pretty sure a yasuo cant 1v2 in a early gank tho unless he is already 5/0 in 3 minutes  with a statick shiv or the mid laner and jungler have parkison disease or something.

> mid laner and jungler have parkison disease

Pretty sure that's what happned when I killed their mid laner ( forgot who) and their jungler, lee in a level 3 gank. MVP has to go to minions though, since they let me dash through them.

> [{quoted}](name=Tails9016,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=jEMuRTlH,comment-id=0002000000020000,timestamp=2017-11-29T19:31:56.040+0000)
>
> Pretty sure that's what happned when I killed their mid laner ( forgot who) and their jungler, lee in a level 3 gank. MVP has to go to minions though, since they let me dash through them.

wait,really?how could someone mess up this badly?especially if the jungle is a lee sin wich one can easily stomp a yasuo in a early gank.

> [{quoted}](name=Knalxz,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=jEMuRTlH,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-11-28T19:29:10.585+0000)
>
> To be fair Yasuo doesn't have any escapes and is very weak to early ganks since he's item reliant.

If the minions are trickling into lane by his own tower can't he dashes to them all the way up lane?
He can’t dash to his own minions
He can dash the enemy minions though, that's why he specified "by his own tower".
They said by his own tower meaning yasuo’s in which case he would already be under tower and wouldn’t need an escape
You're not using much imagination for this, what if he had dashed in to initiate on his enemy who is no longer near his own tower only for it to be a bait for the jungler to come in?

Where did this come from like my guy the only thing he said was if the minions are trickling into lane by HIS own tower can’t he dash all the way up the lane. And even if he meant the enemy that still doesn’t mean he has an escape
shut up and enjoy the meme
Geez, why so hostile?
why so sensitive, all I said was shut up, or can you not take does small words?

> [{quoted}](name=Big Black Croc,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=jEMuRTlH,comment-id=0002000100000000,timestamp=2017-11-28T20:23:42.284+0000)
>
> why so sensitive, all I said was shut up, or can you not take does small words?

Gotta admit, the ending of your comment lost me.
Mabey I did sound too aggressive, I meant you shouldn't be talking about gameplay in a meme.
But does small words take not I?
Any good Yasuo player will use his E to escape. Positioning is key, as usual.

Same goes for anyone who's ganking Yasuo.

if you're good enough to know he's going to try and dash through you and the minions, you postilion yourself for different attack angels to ensure he doesn't get away.
No shit. The point is a good Yasuo will typically put up a fight instead of get one-shot deleted.

As you said, no shit.

What kind of a champion doesn't put up a fight?
"A good Yasuo" as in the player, genius. Not everyone puts up much of a fight because they just can't avoid to getting destroyed instantly.
{{champion:420}} Ganks? You mean buff delivery?

I have sworn to never gank an illaoi, yet I still do. 
######I die every time

I've had junglers that never gank Illaoi...

And I'm really annoyed because I almost 100-0 her on my own but they never come up to give that last bit of damage.

This is just a personal anecdote, but I swear every top laner I have played with that has faced an illaoi goes 0/4 by 10 minutes. they start bitching for ganks at level 3 when I haven't even gotten my first back...

I'm in low elo so I can't expect people to understand how to face her in lane : ^)
this is why i dont main jg, i want too but all you do is become your teams punching bag

{{champion:74}} vs {{champion:420}} 

The world's least gankable lane
they dont have any escape but can double kill , the real ungankable lanes are these botlanes with ezreal / nami / lulu ( 0 way to kill them ) or so or even fizz mid .
The thing is, dashy champs can be caught with their pants down (dash on CD), while Illaoi or Donger are always ready to eat you and your jungler.
you forgot {{champion:74}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:6}}
https://pics.me.me/ive-finally-foun-the-scroll-of-truth-it-after-15-18647757.png

Why isn't he throwing it?

I'd be pissed if I was searching for 15 years and the scroll of truth was just telling me to have a good day.
The sheer disappointment has crippled him, preventing him from throwing the scroll.

You're not reading it right. Look at that last panel again.

https://m.popkey.co/be58ee/16XAj.gif
{{sticker:sg-ahri-2}}
https://image.ibb.co/bx7uzQ/yasuo_salty.jpg
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

{{champion:157}} Going to martial arts practice? Good thing he

**HASAGI!**

(that's the actual line...)

>HASAGI!

I know.

...But I had to google it to be sure. xD
https://www.collegemagazine.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/10/bs.gif

Pantheon jsut dove me for the 5th time in a row and 2 shotted me form full health, clearly this is all my fault, and not becuase pantheon is an OP piece of shit that takes no skill to play, and has almost no counetrplay, and CLEARLY my jungler couldnt have helped by ganking even once.

Exactly.
Learn to spot your mistakes and improve.

> [{quoted}](name=hoyohai,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=jEMuRTlH,comment-id=00060000,timestamp=2017-12-19T05:47:34.552+0000)
>
> Exactly.
> Learn to spot your mistakes and improve.

I couldnt have been any more sarcastic if my sarcasm had taken on a physical form and slapped you in the face.
Me neither.
While true, Riot has been shifting the meta more and more to the favor of the jungler.
